data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who are far from you in Tasmania. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tasmania, Australia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tasmania to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Tasmania, Australia. Please, stir the 69,797 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Tasmania, Australia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 425,602 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Arab, general people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, general people know you.
Father, please give the church in the state of Tasmania prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 495,400 people living in Tasmania.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Tasmania
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
